document.full_text: buffalo sabres goalie ryan miller hasn't been a dominant goalie this season, leading to questions as to how he would do in the playoffs. he delivered his answer in thursday's game 1 against the flyers.
document.title: sabres' miller shows playoff moxie
lines_and_colors: buffalo sabres goalie ryan miller hasn't been a dominant goalie this season, leading to questions as to how he would do in the playoffs. he delivered his answer in thursday's game 1 against the flyers.
